See How Neural Networks Turned a Film From 1896 Into 4K and Added Color
The film shows a train pulling into the ... www.youtube.com/watch?v=3RYNThid23g Shiryaev used Topaz Labs Gigapixel AI to upscale the original 4K, then used DAIN (Depth-Aware Video Frame Interpolation) to add additional frames to raise the rate to 60 fps. You can see a version that has been colorized by DeOldify Neural Network below.

Facebook AI Research (FAIR) today unveiled PyTorch3D, a library that enables researchers and developers to combine deep learning and 3D objects. As part of the release, Facebook is also open-sourcing Mesh R-CNN, a model introduced last year capable of rendering 3D objects from 2D shapes in images of interior spaces.
